About the Client

Supernova is a full software development company of engineers, designers and developers. Mobile App development and custom software solutions in Mexico.

The Challenge

Create the official site for Supernova Apps that provides information about the company, helps them increase their sells, a blog section with technology, motivational and

Headquarters based in San Francisco.
Developers based in Budapest, Hungary.


About Fit Predictor

Fit Predictor finds a customer's best fit in seconds using existing data, without the need for physical measurements. Already available in ten global markets including the United States.
Supports more than 7,000 brands and 40 million unique users per month.
